spell_hex.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Deals 2 to 12 damage to target and makes them more vulnerable to critical attacks. Stacks up to 3 times. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_hex.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Deals 10 to 30 damage to target and makes them more vulnerable to critical attacks. Stacks up to 3 times. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_hex.spellLore: Since its discovery by John Dee, this Hex has proven tried and true and perfectly safe for modern witches.

spell_sunEater.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Deals 5 to 50 damage to target. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_sunEater.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Deals 30 to 60 damage to target. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_sunEater.spellLore: Refined by witches over time, this spell was an accidental discovery of Helvetius in his pursuit to transmute lead into gold.

spell_bind.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Prevents a low energy target from entering flight. DURATION: 30 to 60 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_bind.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Prevents a low energy target from entering flight. DURATION: 60 to 180 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_bind.spellLore: Most assign this simple and dependable variation of the binding spell to Aradia herself, as it was first used by the Italian Benandanti under her guidance in the Ember Wars.

spell_resurrection.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Revives a target in a death state, granting them 10 to 40 energy multiplied by caster level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_resurrection.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Revives a target in a death state, granting them 20 to 60 energy multiplied by caster level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_resurrection.spellLore: Why mess with perfection? We owe the Voodoo Sisters for this brand of resurrection. Crafted by the bayou queen Marie Laveau in the mid nineteenth-century.

spell_bless.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Grants your target 10 to 20 energy multiplied by caster's level. Increases target's Resilience by 1 point for every 3 levels of the caster. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_bless.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Grants your target 30 to 50 energy multiplied by caster's level. Increases target's Resilience by 1 point for every 3 levels of the caster. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_bless.spellLore: This particular spell adopts the poorly kept secrets of Abremelin the Mage concerning the transmutation of the sun's power into magical energy.

spell_silence.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Prevents low energy target from casting spells. DURATION: 10 to 30 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_silence.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Prevents low energy target from casting spells. DURATION: 30 to 60 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_silence.spellLore: Little magic can be used without the spoken word. This version of silence is a secret stolen from the dark Cimmerian Shades that are so adept at silencing trespassers upon their shore.

spell_whiteFlame.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Deals 50 to 70 damage to target. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_whiteFlame.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Deals 100 to 140 damage to target. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_whiteFlame.spellLore: Shared willingly by the Rosicrucian mystics, this lance of light is believed to be cast from the heart of divine man.

spell_grace.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Revives a target in a death state, granting them 20 to 80 energy multiplied by caster level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_grace.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Revives a target in a death state, granting them 50 to 100 energy multiplied by caster level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_grace.spellLore: Said to be written on the walls of the Atlantean Mystery Temple, this powerful spell of restoration has little changed over the centuries.

spell_seal.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Lowers a target's Power and Resilience by 1 point for every 5 levels of the caster. Stacks up to 3 times. DURATION: 60 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_seal.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Lowers a target's Power and Resilience by 1 point for every 3 levels of the caster. Stacks up to 3 times. DURATION: 180 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_seal.spellLore: This remarkably complicated seal was discovered by a not so remarkable herbalist and pharmacologist living in Detroit. He gifted the seal to the Grey Hand coven in 1958 signing it simply as Mr. Davidson.

spell_invisibility.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. You become invisible to all witches until you cast a spell. Witches and spirits with Truesight will still be able to see you. DURATION: Until you cast a spell. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_invisibility.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. You become invisible to all witches until you cast a spell. Witches and spirits with Truesight will still be able to see you. DURATION: Until you cast a spell. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_invisibility.spellLore: For all the power and practical use of invisibility, it is not a complicated spell. This particular version has been chosen by the Grey Hand coven for its relative safety. More ambitious versions run the risk of permanent displacement from the visible world.

spell_dispel.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Removes 1 negative condition from your target. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_dispel.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Removes 1 negative condition from a target. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_dispel.spellLore: The Egyptian Book of the Dead is a trove of wisdom for knowing witches. The dead must be cleansed to traverse the Underworld. This spell is informed by those secret Egyptian rituals.

spell_clarity.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Increase the target's chance to hit by 1% for every 5 levels of the caster. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_clarity.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Increase the target's chance to hit by 1% for every 3 levels of the caster. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_clarity.spellLore: Grants the target the tranquility of still waters, increasing their chance to hit. Assigned to many authors from a Master Mason to a scribe in the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn to an earthen vessel found among the ruins of Solomon's Temple.

spell_sealBalance.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Set target's Resilience equal to Power, and Power equal to Resilience. This effectively changes the Alignment of a witch for a short time. DURATION: 1 minute for every 5 levels of the caster. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_sealBalance.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Set target's Resilience equal to Power, and Power equal to Resilience. This effectively changes the Alignment of a witch for a short time. DURATION: 1 minute for every 3 levels of the caster. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_sealBalance.spellLore: The secret of this balancing spell was hidden for years behind an alchemical cryptogram until it was found deciphered among the papers of John Wilkins, a seventeenth century Bishop of Chester and alleged agent of the Sons of Enoch.

spell_sealLight.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Set target's Power equal to degree of Alignment. This is very effect for White witches. DURATION: 1 minute for every 5 levels of the caster. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_sealLight.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Set target's Power equal to degree of Alignment. This is very effect for White witches. DURATION: 1 minute for every 3 levels of the caster. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_sealLight.spellLore: Assigned to many authors from a Master Mason to a scribe within the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn to an earthen vessel found among the ruins of Solomon's Temple. Either way, works like a charm.

spell_sealShadow.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. This should only be cast on Shadow witches. Grants +1 Resilience to target for every 3 degrees of their shadow Alignment. DURATION: 60 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_sealShadow.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. This should only be cast on Shadow witches. Grants +1 Resilience to target for every 2 degrees of their shadow Alignment. DURATION: 60 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_sealShadow.spellLore: Discovered first among the mutilated Hermetic fragments, this spell was once cast by the Singers of ancient Eqypt in their musical spellcraft. It has been carefully altered by the Grey Hand coven for modern witches.

spell_reflectiveWard.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Whenever target takes damage, the attacker takes half the damage dealt. DURATION: 1 minute for every 5 levels of the caster. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_reflectiveWard.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Whenever target takes damage, the attacker takes half the damage dealt. DURATION: 1 minute for every 5 levels of the caster. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_reflectiveWard.spellLore: The philosopher mages of the Alexandrian School of Neo-Platonism came under many magical attacks. Hypatia herself crafted this defensive spell to protect her disciples.

spell_rageWard.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Target's Power is doubled when their energy is low. If target's Power is 0, their Power is set to 3. DURATION: 1 minute for every 5 levels of the caster. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_rageWard.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Target's Power is doubled when their energy is low. If target's Power is 0, their Power is set to 3. DURATION: 1 minute for every 3 levels of the caster. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_rageWard.spellLore: Comte di Cagliostro suffered dearly for all his magical genius. He left this spell upon the wall of the Inquisitional dungeon in San Leo. The effect, he claimed, strengthened him against his tormentors.

spell_greaterSeal.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Casts Seal on the target 3 times, stacking the bonus to Resilience and Power. DURATION: 60 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_greaterSeal.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Casts Seal on the target 3 times, stacking the bonus to Resilience and Power. DURATION: 180 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_greaterSeal.spellLore: Threefold the power of your common Seal.

spell_greaterBless.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Casts Bless on the target 3 times, stacking the heal and the bonus to Resilience. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_greaterBless.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Casts Bless on the target 3 times, stacking the heal and the bonus to Resilience. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_greaterBless.spellLore: Threefold the power of your common Bless.

spell_greaterHex.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Casts Hex on the target 3 times, stacking the damage and making the target even more vulnerable to critical attacks. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_greaterHex.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Casts Hex on the target 3 times, stacking the damage and making the target even more vulnerable to critical attacks. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_greaterHex.spellLore: Threefold the power of your common Hex.

spell_greaterDispel.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Removes all negative conditions on the target. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_greaterDispel.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Removes all negative conditions on the target. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_greaterDispel.spellLore: This is the full measure of your power to Dispel.

spell_banish.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Sends the target to a random location in spirit form. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_banish.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Sends the target to a random location in spirit form. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_banish.spellLore: Instantly cast your target to some remote region of the world. A favorite Signature of the gamesome witches of the Seven Hills coven. Designed as a spell of teleportation, this unintentional version was found in an esoteric volume stolen from the library of John Dee.

spell_wither.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Binds the target, forbidding them from taking flight. Deals an immediate 30 damage. Unless dispelled deals another 30 to 90 damage in 90 seconds. DURATION: 90 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_wither.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Binds the target, forbidding them from taking flight. Deals an immediate 60 damage. Unless dispelled deals another 60 to 180 damage in 60 seconds. DURATION: 60 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_wither.spellLore: This Signature spell was found somewhere in the esoteric doctrine of the Druids. Masters of all binding magic, the target feels as if they are bound with briars, the pain dulling their wits.

spell_foolBargain.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Target receives up to 50 energy every 20 seconds for 120 seconds. After effect wears off, target immediately takes 50 to 200 damage. DURATION: 120 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_foolBargain.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Target receives up to 100 energy every 20 seconds for 120 seconds. After effect wears off, target immediately takes 100 to 400 damage. DURATION: 120 seconds. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_foolBargain.spellLore: The notorious psychopomp known as the Prince of Merchants sold this Signature to human witches when our war with vampires was at it's most violent. Like most dealings with the Prince, the price is always steep for immediate gains.

spell_leech.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Target takes 100 to 300 damage, caster then receives one half of the damage given. Can only be cast once every 20 minutes. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_leech.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Target takes 200 to 400 damage, caster then receives one half of the damage given. Can only be cast once every 20 minutes. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_leech.spellLore: It is recited by the Sons of Enoch that the Chaldeans held dominion over Babylon, albeit briefly, on the strength of their vampire houses. These houses were known to practice powerful blood magic. While this Signature requires no blood, it's psychic properties are just as strong as the Chaldean variety.

spell_confusion.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Creates false images of the caster within 300 meters. It will create one copy for every 2 levels of the caster. If these images take any damage, they will dissapear. The copies fade away in 1 minute. REQUIRES GREY ALIGNMENT. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_confusion.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Creates false images of the caster within 300 meters. It will create one copy for every 2 levels of the caster. If these images take any damage, they will dissapear. The copies fade away in 5 minute. REQUIRES GREY ALIGNMENT. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_confusion.spellLore: A favorite of the Hermetic orders, nothing delights a trickster witch like addling the mind of their target. Pythagoris stumbled upon this Signature in his study of symmetrical geometric solids. It has remained unchanged in the Grey Hand grimoire.

spell_burst.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Deals 200 to 280 damage, with a 50% chance of critical strike. Critical strike will double the damage. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_burst.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Deals 300 to 380 damage, with a 50% chance of critical strike. Critical strike will double the damage. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_burst.spellLore: The wonder mirrors of Japan served as little more than curiosities until one was discovered to reveal a secret pattern that informed the Signature of this powerful spell.

spell_lazurus.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Revives a target and grants them 200 to 300 energy. Target's resilience is set to caster's level for 1 minute. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_lazurus.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Revives a target and grants them 300 to 400 energy. Target's resilience is set to caster's level for 3 minutes. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_lazurus.spellLore: Raise a target from the dead, and shield them with an aura of protection.

spell_shadowfeet.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Revives a target and grants them 100 to 200 energy. Caster then loses 10 times their degree of shadow alignment. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_shadowfeet.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Revives a target and grants them 200 to 400 energy. Caster then loses 10 times their degree of shadow alignment. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_shadowfeet.spellLore: Bring a target from the binds of Death and grant them firm Resilience for several minutes. However, target will also take damage over time.

spell_wail.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Banishes a target to a random location in the world. Deals between 10 and 300 damage, based on how far away the witch is thrown. Can only be cast on witches. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_wail.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Banishes a target to a random location in the world. Deals between 50 and 600 damage, based on how far away the witch is thrown. Can only be cast on witches. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_wail.spellLore: Jack Fiddler, the notorious witch that made his name banishing Wendigos, was taught the secret of stealing their unearthly screams by a mysterious Cree medicine girl only known as Kanti. It is from her wisdom that we craft this Signature.

spell_trueSight.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Reveals hidden witches, places of power, spirits and items within 3 kilometers. DURATION: 1 hour. REQUIRES GREY ALIGNMENT. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_trueSight.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Reveals hidden witches, places of power, spirits and items within 3 kilometers. DURATION: 3 hours. REQUIRES GREY ALIGNMENT. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_trueSight.spellLore: Another gift of Zhang Guolao, this spell is believed to be the accidental result of crafting a spell alleviating the need for sleep.

spell_crowsEye.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Reveals hidden witches, places of power, spirits and items worldwide. DURATION: 1 hour. REQUIRES GREY ALIGNMENT. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_crowsEye.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Reveals hidden witches, places of power, spirits and items worldwide. DURATION: 3 hours. REQUIRES GREY ALIGNMENT. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_crowsEye.spellLore: Another gift of Zhang Guolao, this spell is believed to be the accidental result of crafting a spell alleviating the need for sleep.

spell_twilightDusk.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Deals 80 to 240 damage immediately, then increases target's power by 1 point per 5 levels of the caster. In addition, target's resilience is lowered by 1 point per 5 levels of the caster. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_twilightDusk.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Deals 80 to 240 damage immediately, then increases target's power by 1 point per 5 levels of the caster. In addition, target's resilience is lowered by 1 point per 5 levels of the caster. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_twilightDusk.spellLore: One of the minor offerings of Zhang Guolao to the canon of witchcraft, this spell is believed to be the accidental result of crafting a spell for shapeshifting into a bat.

spell_shadowMark.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Target is given the hidden mark of Mary's Kiss. This condition is only visible to those with Truesight. If the condition is dispelled, it inflicts 200 to 400 damage on the target and equal damage to the witch that dispels the mark. DURATION: Mark will stay on the target for 1 hour per caster's degree of Shadow. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_shadowMark.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Target is given the hidden mark of Mary's Kiss. This condition is only visible to those with Truesight. If the condition is dispelled, it inflicts 400 to 600 damage on the target and equal damage to the witch that dispels the mark. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_shadowMark.spellLore: This curse was found upon a tablet during Woolley’s excavation at Ur in the 1920's. It was then adapted into spellcraft by the Glorious 99, a Hive of witches that thrived in Iran until their mysterious undoing in the late 60's. Beware, it is a tricky spell with a tendancy to backfire.

spell_twilightDawn.spellDescription: You are in spirit form. Deals 80 to 240 damage immediately, then increases target's resilience by 1 point per 5 levels of the caster. In addition, target's power is lowered by 1 point per 5 levels of the caster. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 The farther from your physical form, the weaker you become.
spell_twilightDawn.spellDescriptionPhysical: You are in physical form. Deals 80 to 240 damage immediately, then increases target's resilience by 1 point per 5 levels of the caster. In addition, target's power is lowered by 1 point per 5 levels of the caster. DURATION: 1 minute per caster's level. LEVEL REQUIREMENT: 1 You are at your strongest in physical form.
spell_twilightDawn.spellLore: Another gift of Zhang Guolao, this spell is believed to be the accidental result of crafting a spell alleviating the need for sleep.

spell_hex.asCaster: Success. You HEX {3} dealing {6} damage. {3} is now {10} vulnerable to critical attacks.
spell_hex.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast HEX on you. You lose {6} energy. You will be vulnerable to critical attacks while afflicted with HEX.

spell_sunEater.asCaster: Success. Your SUN EATER dealt {6} damage to {3}
spell_sunEater.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast SUN EATER on you. You lose {6} energy.

spell_bind.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast BIND on you. You are unable to fly until BIND wears off or it is dispelled.

spell_resurrection.asTarget: The {2} {0} revived you, granting you {6} energy.

spell_bless.asTarget: The {2} {0} has BLESSED you, granting you {6} energy. Your RESILIENCE has increased to {8}.

spell_silence.asCaster: Success. You have SILENCED {3}. They are unable to cast as long as they are SILENCED.
spell_silence.asTarget: The {2} {0} has SILENCED you. You are unable to cast while SILENCED.

spell_whiteFlame.asCaster: Success. Your WHITE FLAME deals {6} damage to {3}.
spell_whiteFlame.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast WHITE FLAME on you. You lose {6} energy.

spell_grace.asCaster: Success. You have revived {3}, granting them {6} energy.
spell_grace.asTarget: The {2} {0} revived you, granting you {6} energy.

spell_seal.asCaster: Success. Your SEAL has reduced the POWER and RESILIENCE of {3} by {8}.
spell_seal.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast SEAL on you. Your POWER and RESILIENCE have been reduced by {8}.

spell_dispel.asCaster: Success. You removed 1 damaging condition from {3}.
spell_dispel.asTarget: The {2} {0} has dispelled one damaging condition from you.

spell_clarity.asCaster: Success. {3} is now gifted with CLARITY. They have a {9}% greater chance of success with their spells.
spell_clarity.asTarget: The {2} {0} has granted you CLARITY. Your chance of success with spells is increased by {9}%.

spell_sealBalance.asCaster: Success. {3}'s RESILIENCE is now {12} and their POWER is now {13}.
spell_sealBalance.asTarget: The {2} {0} has cast SEAL OF BALANCE on you. Your RESILIENCE is now {12} and POWER is {13}.

spell_sealLight.asTarget: The {2} {0} has cast SEAL OF LIGHT on you. Your POWER is now {14}.

spell_sealShadow.asTarget: The {2} {0} has gifted you with SEAL OF SHADOW. You gain {8} RESILIENCE.

spell_reflectiveWard.asCaster: Success. {3} is now gifted with REFLECTIVE WARD, whenever they take damage, half of the damage will be reflected back on the attacker.
spell_reflectiveWard.asTarget: The {2} {0} has gifted you with REFLECTIVE WARD. Half of all incoming damage will be reflected back to the attacker.

spell_rageWard.asCaster: Success. {3} is gifted with RAGE WARD. At low energy, their POWER will be doubled.
spell_rageWard.asTarget: The {2} {0} has gifted you with RAGE WARD. At low energy, your POWER will be doubled.

spell_greaterSeal.asCaster: Success. {3} is gifted with GREATER SEAL. Their POWER is now {13} and RESILIENCE is {12}.
spell_greaterSeal.asTarget: The {2} {0} has gifted you with GREATER SEAL. Your POWER is now {13} and RESILIENCE is {12}.

spell_greaterBless.asCaster: Success. {3} is gifted with GREATER BLESS, granting them {6} energy and + {8} RESILIENCE.
spell_greaterBless.asTarget: The {2} {0} has gifted you with GREATER BLESS, granting you {6} energy and + {8} RESILIENCE.

spell_greaterHex.asCaster: Success. {3} is cursed with GREATER HEX, inflicting {6} damage and making them significantly more vulnerable to critical attacks.
spell_greaterHex.asTarget: The {2} {0} has cursed you with GREATER HEX. You lose {6} energy and are now significantly more vulnerable to critical attacks.

spell_greaterDispel.asCaster: Success. You removed all negative conditions from {3}.
spell_greaterDispel.asTarget: The {2} {0} has removed all negative conditions from you.

spell_banish.asCaster: Success. You have banished {3} to a random location in the world. Not nice at all!
spell_banish.asTarget: The {2} {0} has banished you! That wasn't very nice at all.

spell_wither.asCaster: Success. {3} is WITHERING. They are BOUND and will suffer {6} damage now more when the condition expires.
spell_wither.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast WITHER on you. You are BOUND to this location. You suffer {6} damage and will suffer more when WITHER expires.

spell_leech.asCaster: Success. Your LEECH inflicts {6} damage. You are healed for {15} energy.
spell_leech.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast LEECH on you. You suffer {6} damage and {0} gains {15} energy.

spell_burst.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast BURST on you dealing {6} damage.

spell_lazurus.asCaster: Success. You have revived {3}, granting them {6} energy. Their RESILIENCE is set to {12} for 1 minute.
spell_lazurus.asTarget: The {2} {0} revived you, granting you {6} energy. Your RESILIENCE is set to {8} for 1 minute.

spell_shadowfeet.asCaster: Success. You have revived {3} granting them {6}, but you lose {15} energy.
spell_shadowfeet.asTarget: The {2} {0} revived you, granting you {6}. They suffer {15} damage to bring you back.

spell_wail.asCaster: Success. You have banished {3}. Somewhere. They also suffer {15} damage.
spell_wail.asTarget: The {2} {0} has banished you! You suffer {6} damage.

spell_invisibility.asCaster: Success. {3} is now invisible to all but those with the power of Truesight.
spell_invisibility.asTarget: The {2} {0} has granted you Invisiblity. Only those with Truesight will be able to see you. Casting any spell will remove this condition.

spell_trueSight.asCaster: Success. You have granted the gift of Truesight to {3}. They can now see what is not meant to be seen within 3 kilometers.
spell_trueSight.asTarget: The {2} {0} has granted you Truesight. You can now see what is not meant to be seen within 3 kilometers.

spell_crowsEye.asCaster: Success. You have granted the gift of Truesight to {3}. They can now see what is not meant to be seen worldwide.
spell_crowsEye.asTarget: The {2} {0} has granted you Truesight. You can now see what is not meant to be seen worldwide.

spell_twilightDusk.asCaster: Success. Your TWILIGHT DUSK has dealt {6} damage to {3}, set their POWER to {13}, and their RESILIENCE to {12}.
spell_twilightDusk.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast TWILIGHT DUSK on you. You lose {6} energy, your POWER is now {13}, and your RESILIENCE is now {12}.

spell_shadowMark.asCaster: Success. {3} wears the hidden mark of Mary's Kiss. If dispelled, both {3} and the witch that dispels the mark will suffer significant damage.
spell_shadowMark.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast the hidden mark of Mary's Kiss. If dispelled, both you and the witch that dispels the mark will suffer significant damage.

spell_twilightDawn.asTarget: The {2} {0} cast TWILIGHT DAWN on you. You lose {6} energy, your RESILIENCE is now {12}, and your POWER is now {13}.

mainui.description: Let's take a tour of the main user interface of Covens.
mainui.title: Understanding the user interface

fly.description: Of course you can fly! Let's learn flight and the important difference between Spirit and Physical form.
fly.title: Flight school for witches

summoning.description: How to summon Otherworldly spirits and the rule that must not be broken.
summoning.title: The unstable art of Summoning

spellcasting.description: Witchcraft is not simple sorcery! Here we learn the old ways of wielding magic and how to make the most of ingredients.
spellcasting.title: Making the most of your spells

path.description: Let's learn how your spell choices influence your alignment. And how your alignment effects the spells you cast.
path.title: Learning the alignment paths

energy.description: Don't get stranded with no energy. Learn how to rejuvenate your magical essence.
energy.title: Reviving your lifeforce

money.description: Silver and Gold are used to buy elixirs, gear and specialty items. Let's learn how witches accumulate wealth.
money.title: How to earn silver and gold

tribunal.description: Let's learn about the seasonal tournaments, the rewards and the leaderboards.
tribunal.title: The seasonal tournaments of witchcraft

store.description: How to deal with our illustrious gypsy-sage Madame Fortuna, trader of all things witchy.
store.title: Madame Fortuna's emporium

wardrobe.description: How to enjoy the hundreds of cosmetic variations a witch can have.
wardrobe.title: Managing your wardrobe

inventory.description: Collecting and keeping track of your botanicals, tools, gems and unique items.
inventory.title: Managing your inventory

moon.description: Every day is different in Covens. Let's learn how the moon effects your magical energy.
moon.title: How the moon influences your energy

covens.description: Learn how Covens work and how working with others can benefit you greatly!
covens.title: How Covens work

bos.description: The Book of Shadows is very personal to every witch. You can find a collection of your magical learning.
bos.title: Learning your magical grimoire

conditions.description: Spell casting can leave some lasting effects on other witches. Learn which spells can help or hurt others!
conditions.title: The consequences of spells

pop.description: Controlling Places of Power is a great way to help your coven, earn noteriety, and claim rewards.
pop.title: What are Places of Power?

deck.description: Let's learn how to control Otherworldly spirits and summon them from you Spirit Deck.
deck.title: Learning your Spirit Deck

portals.description: Let's learn what portals mean and how to interact with them.
portals.title: The meaning of spirit portals

dailies.description: A witch's work is never done. Daily quests can earn you easy rewards.
dailies.title: Your daily witch quests

savannahGrey.description: She's been called the mother of modern witchcraft. Who is Savannah Grey and what does the Grey Hand Coven mean to you?
savannahGrey.title: Savannah Grey and the Grey Hand Coven

FTFDialogues.value: Savannah Grey: "You're all alone, witch. Let's get you some protection."
Savannah Grey: "The Barghest is a spectral hound that can act as a protector for witches"
Savannah Grey: "Before you can summon the Barghest, you must first defeat it in battle."
Savannah Grey: "Tap on the Barghest Spirit to continue."
Savannah Grey: "I will weaken this Barghest for you."
Savannah Grey: "Let's use a spell from the White School to capture this Barghest."
Savannah Grey: "Well done! You have captured your first spirit."
Savannah Grey: "The Barghest is now in your Spirit Deck."
Savannah Grey: "There are hundreds of spirits in the world that can be captured and summoned."
Savannah Grey: "Let's summon your Barghest now..."
Savannah Grey: "Brilliant! You completed your first summoning ritual!"
Savannah Grey: "The Barghest is a Familiar type spirit. It will follow you around and protect you."
Savannah Grey: "It will be very aggressive to anything that attacks you, especially other witches . . ."
Savannah Grey: "Speaking of other witches, I've summoned Ms. Brigid Sawyer to {{Location}} to offer a little guidance . . ."
Brigid Sawyer / Seven Hills Coven / Dominion of California
Savannah Grey: "Ms. Sawyer, so good to see you. I see you've chosen the Shadow Path . . ."
Brigid Sawyer: "I find comfort in the shadows, Dea."
Savannah Grey: "Now, tap Brigid."
Savannah Grey: "Let's begin by casting a simple Hex on Brigid . . ."
Savannah Grey: "Your common Hex did a little damage to Brigid. It will do more damage over time unless it is dispelled."
Savannah Grey: "Brigid is immune to your magic until she casts on you."
Brigid Sawyer: "What an adorable little Hex, {{Player Name}}. You've saved me the trouble of feeding Theo, my Fowler spirit."
Savannah Grey: "Bringing your Fowler to train a new witch, Brigid? Seems out of taste."
Brigid Sawyer: "I thought you'd be impressed, Dea."
Savannah Grey: "How can we teach {{him/her}} witchcraft when {{he/she}} cannot speak?!"
Brigid Sawyer: "I think a Cat Sidhe's got {{his/her}} tongue, Dea."
Savannah Grey: "Let's give this cheeky witch . . . oh no!"
Brigid uses signature ingredients to cast: Mirrors.
Savannah Grey: "You are one bold little witch, Brigid Sawyer."
Savannah Grey: "No bother, {{Player Name}}, I'm granting you a very powerful blessing called Truesight."
Savannah Grey: "The gift of Truesight allows you to see what is not meant to be seen."
Savannah Grey: "{{Player Name}}! Brigid has lost the plot! You have my word she'll pay for that... Let's get you back on your feet!"
Savannah Grey: "Brigid used ingredients to make her spell more powerful, including the very rare Halfeti rose only found in Turkey."
Savannah Grey: "I will grant you a blessing of energy every day. Use my gift wisely."
Brigid Sawyer: "Really, Dea? Banish me to Uluru!? {{Player Name}}, I'll send you a bill for my services . . ."
Savannah Grey: "I think it's time we introduce you to Madame Fortuna. She can provide you sufficient ingredients to get started . . ."
Madame Fortuna: "Sastipe, Dea Grey! It is always a pleasure my dear lady . . ."
Savannah Grey: "The pleasure is mine, dear friend. {{Player Name}} is our newest witch; {{he/she}} needs a collection of ingredients for {{his/her}} spellcraft."
Madame Fortuna: "Va! Sastipe, {{Player Name}}, you have come to the right place. And I have just the collection for a witch learning their craft . . ."
Savannah Grey: "Abondia's Best collection added 940 items to your inventory! You can collect items for spellcraft all over the world."
Savannah Grey: "Well, witch, that's quite enough hand-holding. I officially welcome you to the {{Season}} tournament of witchcraft. {{Number}} days remain."
Savannah Grey: "This is just the beginning of your adventure. I strongly suggest you visit Witch School, but if you're the adventurous type, feel free to explore on your own."
Savannah Grey: "As long as you abide by my rules, I'll continue to grant you a daily blessing of energy."

assassin.value: Moves to and attacks vulnerable enemies nearby

familiar.value: Protects its summoner and fights with them

forbidden.value: Very aggressive spirit that can attack everything, including summoner and allies

guardian.value: Protects its summoning location; good for Places of Power and Portals

harvester.value: Collects nearby items of value for its summoner

healer.value: A spirit that blesses its summoner and allies

resurrector.value: Resurrects its summoner and allies in need

trickster.value: Unpredictable warrior spirit that casts a random spell on any witch

hunter.value: Moves to and attacks enemy spirits nearby

consumable_invisible.onConsumeDescription: You're invisible! While invisible you can move around and chat with others. Any other action will remove the spell.

See what longs to be unseen. Discover what longs to be undiscovered. Never (and I mean never) combine with grapefruit.
consumable_truesight.onConsumeDescription: You now have the gift of True Sight. Look around, you never know what you might find.

cosmetic_f_S_HHO.title: WITCH COSTUME
cosmetic_f_S_HHO.onBuyTitle: Witches remain one of the most traditional and popular Halloween costumes. The source of the iconic witch costume is debated, but many believe the conical hat began as a status symbol of powerful religious figures, while the black cat has connections to the Egyptian goddess Bastet.

cosmetic_f_S_HKO.title: KIMONO
cosmetic_f_S_HKO.onBuyTitle: The Japanese kimono is believed to have been adopted during the Kofun period in between 300 and 500 A.D. It has been modified into a unique clothing style that is typically worn during traditional and formal ceremonies. Kimonos are regarded as artistic creations and are frequently decorated with beautiful floral or geometric patterns.

cosmetic_f_S_HLO.title: LEOPARD PRINT
cosmetic_f_S_HLO.onBuyTitle: The leopard print has traditionally been considered a status of wealth and status, particularly for aristocratic members of the Kingdom of Benin. The gele is a traditional headpiece of the Edo people, the descendents of the founders of this kingdom.

cosmetic_f_S_SNOWQUEEN.title: SNOW QUEEN
cosmetic_f_S_SNOWQUEEN.onBuyTitle: The Snow Queen is the titular character from Hans Christian Anderson's 19th century fairy tale, whose kiss lures a child far from home.

cosmetic_m_S_HHO.title: WITCH DOCTOR
cosmetic_m_S_HHO.onBuyTitle: The original witch doctors were said to heal ordinary people from curses inflicted by malicious witches.

cosmetic_m_S_HKO.title: KIMONO
cosmetic_m_S_HKO.onBuyTitle: The Japanese kimono is believed to have been adopted during the Kofun period in between 300 and 500 A.D. It has been modified into a unique clothing style that is typically worn during traditional and formal ceremonies. Kimonos are regarded as artistic creations and are frequently decorated with beautiful floral or geometric patterns.

cosmetic_m_S_HLO.title: EGYPTIAN PHAROAH
cosmetic_m_S_HLO.onBuyTitle: For the ancient Egyptians, magic was a constant presence in their daily life; it balanced their universe and brought harmony in life and in death. The ancient Egyptian god of magic was called Heka, and his power was so great that he was feared even by the other gods.

cosmetic_m_S_JACKFROST.title: JACK FROST
cosmetic_m_S_JACKFROST.onBuyTitle: The personification of winter, Jack Frost is traditionally said to leave frost patterns on windows on cold nights.

cosmetic_m_S_FIREDANCER.title: FIRE DANCER
cosmetic_m_S_FIREDANCER.onBuyTitle: The Summer solstice marks the longest day of the year for the Northern Hemisphere. Many celebrate by dancing around fires to honor the sun and drive out evil. Crops approach their full maturity during this time. A good Solstice celebration means a plentiful harvest to come.

cosmetic_f_S_LILYOV.title: LILY OF THE VALLEY
cosmetic_f_S_LILYOV.onBuyTitle: The Summer solstice marks the longest day of the year for the Northern Hemisphere. Many celebrate by dancing around fires to honor the sun and drive out evil. Crops approach their full maturity during this time. A good Solstice celebration means a plentiful harvest to come.

cosmetic_f_S_CALYPSO.title: CALYPSO
cosmetic_f_S_CALYPSO.onBuyTitle: The Crop Over festival in Barbados is a lively, colorful event celebrating their generous cultivation of sugarcane. Kadooment Day is the final day of the festival. Masquerade bands playing Calypso music and dancers decorated in jewels and feathers honor the end with an animated parade.

cosmetic_m_S_CALYPSO.title: CALYPSO
cosmetic_m_S_CALYPSO.onBuyTitle: The Crop Over festival in Barbados is a lively, colorful event celebrating their generous cultivation of sugarcane. Kadooment Day is the final day of the festival. Masquerade bands playing Calypso music and dancers decorated in jewels and feathers honor the end with an animated parade.

garden_bellWitch.title: Grove of the Bell Witch
garden_bellWitch.description: Here is the chosen ground of the legendary barrow sister known as the Bell Witch. This old sister has made too many bargains with agents of the Underworld to be trusted. While this area will provide in plenty, we do not recommend you stay for long. There is little warning when the Bell Witch will rise from her grotto.

garden_brockenMountain.title: Brocken Mountain
garden_brockenMountain.description: A favorite haunt for witches since ancient times. It is here that a coven of Pythagorean disciples perfected the earliest forms of astral projection. We know them now as the first Greek shamans. Before their final soul-journey, they consecrated the Brocken as a bastion for all future magic workers. It served as a chosen staging ground for witches during the Ember Wars.

garden_crossroadsAmerica.title: Times Square
garden_crossroadsAmerica.description: Beneath the concrete and neon of this urban jungle magical energies converge to form one of the major crossroads of the modern world. Such convergence creates a wellspring of spiritual and magical powers and quickens the heart's blood of every witch that gathers here.

garden_crossroadsAncient.title: The Ancient Crossroad
garden_crossroadsAncient.description: Modern-day Kabul is built on the crossroads of the ancient world. The veil has long been thin in this realm allowing Otherworldly spirits easy passage into our world. If we trust the Sons of Enoch, it is here that around 1608 the great Italian covens gathered to form the hive "Good Walkers" and banished the evil Duke Murmur back to the Underworld.

garden_nakagusukuRift.title: Nakagusuku Grove
garden_nakagusukuRift.description: Toil and trouble abound in this realm. The Sons of Enoch claim this grove was home to a clan of figurine-carvers that with imperial patronage studied the art of necromancy in the hope to animate fallen ancestors of the royal family. They proved to be master carvers, but their mediation with the dead only served to corrupt the land of Nakagusuku.

garden_fengdu.title: Mingshan Mountain
garden_fengdu.description: The King of Hell may have left the door open, for the Mingshan Mountain is trafficked by spirits as well as demonkind. Witches should not dwell too long in this city of ghosts. Should you choose to harvest here, do so by day.

garden_hellfireClub.title: Hell-Fire Club
garden_hellfireClub.description: The Brass Castle, on top of Montpelier Hill was made with the stones of nearby ancient graves. This caused the spirits to lash out and grow restless in the surrounding area. The hill is home to the paranormal and where members of the occult come to gather.

garden_lostLaNoria.title: Hacienda Castilla
garden_lostLaNoria.description: The desert wind soughs through the ruins of old La Noria, whispering the names of the many who have died here. This is a quiet land; a land of sadness; a land of ghosts. A knowing witch may find counsel with the languishing spirits of La Noria, and wisdom in such counsel, but beware the demons that feed upon their sadness.

garden_xunantunich.title: Xunantunich Temple
garden_xunantunich.description: Early explorers noticed a woman in white with glowing red eyes ascending the stairs of the Castillo and disappearing into a stone wall. Xunantunich was thereafter named for her and means "the stone woman" in Mayan. Is she a priestess? Was the young man buried in the temple her lover? Whoever she is, she's powerful and draws many spirits to the once wealthy citadel.

garden_hoghtonBottoms.title: Hoghton Tower
garden_hoghtonBottoms.description: The fortified manor house Hoghton Tower was originally built in 1109 by Harvey de Walter, a William the Conqueror companion. Over the years it's hosted numerous royalty, Shakespeare and Dickens among others. Some visitors never leave, however, such as the laughing girl, the monk by the north tower, and the lady in green. As one of the most haunted locations in England, this is a rich hunting ground for enterprising witches.

garden_groveAricia.title: Grove of Aricia
garden_groveAricia.description: The worship of Diana Nemorensis, or "Diana of the Wood" was brought to Lake Nemi by King Orestes. Legend has it any stranger who set foot on the island was sacrificed on her altar. A sacred grove occupied ground that later became an Etruscan temple. This is a magical place where a witch might gather power or a freedom granting branch if you are quick.

garden_mountHekla.title: Mount Hekla
garden_mountHekla.description: Mount Hekla is known for its volcanic activity that poisons native herds with its deadly residues. Some believe condemned souls travel the volcanic tunnels to the crater on their way to hell. The volcanic ridge is twenty-five miles long giving witches a lucrative path to harvest or commune with the dead, but not all souls are willing to suffer the living.

coll_monocle.description: Only the classiest of the classy wear this dapper accessory.

coll_darkCharm.name: Dark Charm
coll_darkCharm.description: There's an unsettling atmosphere wherever this charm is present.

coll_foxFur.name: Fox Fur
coll_foxFur.description: Orange fur from a roaming fox.

coll_magnet.name: Magnet
coll_magnet.description: This little piece of metal generates its own magnetic field.

coll_poisonArrow.name: Poisoned Arrow
coll_poisonArrow.description: A stone arrowhead laced with toxins.

coll_sweetTreat.name: Sweet Treat
coll_sweetTreat.description: Is this a trick? Or is it a treat?

coll_goatMilk.name: Goat's Milk
coll_goatMilk.description: Some critters really like the taste of this bottle of goat's milk.

coll_axeHandle.name: Axe Handle
coll_axeHandle.description: A chipped handle of an axe.

coll_bambooSymbol.name: Bamboo Symbol
coll_bambooSymbol.description: A symbol made out of the toughest bamboo.

coll_remains.name: Bloody Remains
coll_remains.description: This small rodent carcass is still wet with its blood.

coll_bloodySkin.name: Bloody Skin
coll_bloodySkin.description: This bloody skin may belong to a human, but it's unidentifiable.

coll_brokenAmulet.name: Broken Amulet
coll_brokenAmulet.description: This broken necklace once was a part of a decorative amulet.

coll_brokenMirror.name: Broken Mirror
coll_brokenMirror.description: A shard of a broken mirror... that's bad luck.

coll_brokenVial.name: Broken Vial
coll_brokenVial.description: Something used to be in this small shattered bottle.

coll_coffeeBeans.name: Coffee Beans
coll_coffeeBeans.description: Grind these beans into a powder for the first step to making coffee.

coll_fireWand.name: Fire Wand
coll_fireWand.description: A staff usually set on fire for ceremonial dances.

coll_freshMilk.name: Fresh Milk
coll_freshMilk.description: A bottle of fresh, cold milk.

coll_kudurru.name: Kudurru Fragment
coll_kudurru.description: A small piece of an ancient kudurru, a stone used to inscribe land grants.

coll_perfume.name: Perfume
coll_perfume.description: A bottle of sweet smelling perfume.

coll_pineIncense.name: Pine Incense
coll_pineIncense.description: Make your room smell like the forest by lighting this incense.

coll_rustyFlask.name: Rusty Flask
coll_rustyFlask.description: The condition of this flask indicates that it - as well as its owner - has been around for centuries.

coll_salt.name: Salt Offering
coll_salt.description: Pure salt to be prepared for an offering.

coll_starSymbol.name: Star Symbol
coll_starSymbol.description: This symbol is in the shape of a star.

coll_strawStrand.name: Straw Strand
coll_strawStrand.description: A strand of a dry cereal stalk.

coll_incense.name: Sweet Incense
coll_incense.description: This incense has a sweet and alluring scent.

coll_woodAsh.name: Wood Ashes
coll_woodAsh.description: The remaining ashes of a wood fire.

coll_wootzSteel.name: Wootz Steel
coll_wootzSteel.description: An ingot of steel, recognized as wootz by its several layers and bands.

coll_brokenPaddle.name: Broken Paddle
coll_brokenPaddle.description: This broken paddle isn't going to help your rowboat anytime soon.

coll_rainwater.name: Collected Rainwater
coll_rainwater.description: A vial of water collected from the rain over time.

coll_hyenaFur.name: Hyena Fur
coll_hyenaFur.description: Fur taken from a vicious hyena.

coll_leopardTablet.name: Leopard Tablet
coll_leopardTablet.description: A stone tablet inscribed with the image of a grim leopard.

coll_lightningRod.name: Lightning Rod
coll_lightningRod.description: Hold this in the air during a lightning storm and you're bound to be struck.

coll_lionTablet.name: Lion Tablet
coll_lionTablet.description: A stone tablet inscribed with the image of a rampant lion.

coll_monkeyTotem.name: Monkey Totem
coll_monkeyTotem.description: A wooden totem carved into the shape of a monkey.

coll_navalRum.name: Naval Rum
coll_navalRum.description: A small bottle of rum given to Royal Navy sailors.

coll_owlTalon.name: Owl's Talon
coll_owlTalon.description: A sharp talon taken from an owl.

coll_plagueMask.name: Plague Mask
coll_plagueMask.description: A piece of the mask worn by plague doctors during the Black Death.

coll_seaglass.name: Seaglass
coll_seaglass.description: Chemically and physically weathered glass found alongside beaches.

coll_shinyTrinket.name: Shiny Trinket
coll_shinyTrinket.description: This metal trinket shines like the sun.

coll_spicyRum.name: Spicy Rum
coll_spicyRum.description: This rum has a hint of cinnamon in it.

coll_carvingKnife.name: Carving Knife
coll_carvingKnife.description: A knife used to carve a pumpkin.

coll_dragonScale.name: Dragon's Scale
coll_dragonScale.description: A piece of rough skin taken from that of a dragon.

coll_pomade.name: Pomade
coll_pomade.description: A greasy and waxy hair styler.

coll_redApple.name: Red Apple
coll_redApple.description: One of these a day will keep the Healer Spirits away.

coll_redFabric.name: Red Fabric
coll_redFabric.description: A pure piece of red fabric, hopefully not to be cut into a Red Ribbon.

coll_adderFork.name: Adder's Fork
coll_adderFork.description: A fern with fangs and a favorite piece for the cauldron of wayward sisters.

coll_agathosma.name: Agathosma
coll_agathosma.description: The oil of Agathosma was over harvested in the coven wars of Africa in the 1980's. Rare now, but just as potent, especially in baneful magics.

coll_agrimony.name: Agrimony
coll_agrimony.description: A lovely flower known to induce even more lovely dreams. Used wisely a hex breaker, aura cleanser and general aid to healing spells.

coll_agueWeed.name: Ague Weed
coll_agueWeed.description: Favored by trickster witches of the grey path, useful in deception and brain addling spells.

coll_allspice.name: Allspice
coll_allspice.description: The favorite botanical of the Obi Man of Jamaica, it is associated with Mars, fire and masculine energy. Typically empowers a spell no matter the alignment.

coll_althea.name: Althea
coll_althea.description: Once found by the sacred pools of Avalon, it served as a powerful botanical in the time of Arthur. Now more common with witches the potency of the flower seems to have waned.

coll_angelica.name: Angelica
coll_angelica.description: Aligned with sun and flames and the angelic world, used in the Ember Wars to keep evil plague bringers in check.

coll_anise.name: Anise
coll_anise.description: Ruled by Mercury, a kitchen herb, used in protection from evil spirits by those brave or foolish enough to harness them, and often carried in a satchet to ward off the evil eye.

coll_antarcticGrass.name: Antarctic Hair Grass
coll_antarcticGrass.description: The world's most southernmost plant. Can be found in frozen lands, and is one of the only two signs of life in Antarctica

coll_antarcticWort.name: Antarctic Pearl Wort
coll_antarcticWort.description: This small, yellow flower can be found in the world's frozen lands. It is, along with its Antarctic Hair Grass sister, one of the only two signs of life in Antarctica.

coll_asafetida.name: Asafetida
coll_asafetida.description: For the wise, this herb can cast out devils or ease the passage of good spirits entering our world.

coll_ayahuasc.name: Ayahuasca
coll_ayahuasc.description: Powerful portal to oneness, healing, and self-knowledge if guided by a shaman pure of heart. Violent illness is often experienced prior to vision.

coll_gileadBalm.name: Balm of Gilead
coll_gileadBalm.description: Balm of Gilead was a rare perfume often used medicinally, and often thought of as a cure all. It is named for the region of Gilead which can be found in the Bible.

coll_barberry.name: Barberry
coll_barberry.description: It is not unlike the barberry to bewilder a witch that does not know its proper use. Take care in your craft with this seeming innocuous sweet; or eat it and be done with it.

coll_basil.name: Basil
coll_basil.description: A practical botanical especially useful in benevolent and protective spellcraft.

coll_bayLeaf.name: Bay Leaf
coll_bayLeaf.description: Exceptionally useful as a fumigant, worn by healers, and those in need of luck.  Powerful oracles are said to gain clarity of vision through burning the bay leaf.

coll_bella.name: Belladonna
coll_bella.description: Nature's embodiment of the beautiful lady of war. In the hands of an adept it can empower the strongest spells in witchcraft, but to the novice it can be deadly.

coll_bergamot.name: Bergamot
coll_bergamot.description: An herb of the sun, but versatile. Adept shadow witches have learned creative ways to use Bergamot. The wisest barrow sisters are said to use bergamot to induce long sleeps allowing them to traverse the Otherworld.

coll_betony.name: Betony
coll_betony.description: A humble leaf for clear thinking. Little risk means little gains. A suitable border for graveyards.

coll_bindweed.name: Bindweed
coll_bindweed.description: Herb of gladness, clever use will grant you courage. The witches that faced the White Jikininki on Mount Koya are said to have burned a ring of bindweed before the battle.

coll_birch.name: Birch
coll_birch.description: White lady of the woods, her innate powers are myriad. All alignments may find potent uses for Birch. They have sheltered the wood witches for centuries and served the venerable Benandanti in their astral wanderings.

coll_shadeBlack.name: Black Nightshade
coll_shadeBlack.description: A rare and potent plant, sacred to the enchanter. The black nightshade should never be harvested in the light of day. A component to many powerful signatures, its use should be reserved to well practiced witches.

coll_blueberry.name: Blueberry
coll_blueberry.description: A tasty rich berry for protection. While not making delicious foods out of it, keeping it near your home will protect you from evil spirits, magic, and wrongdoings.

coll_borage.name: Borage
coll_borage.description: Borage was often eaten by Roman soldiers before battle and worn in scarves by Medieval Knights. Known as the happy herb and used to dispel many negative effects.

coll_broomTop.name: Broom Top
coll_broomTop.description: Decorative branches adorned with yellow flowers brought together in a clutch, carried by maidens to promote peace after the Ember Days. Lightly fragrant incense burned within the bundle creates a superior wanding effect.

coll_calamusRoot.name: Calamus Root
coll_calamusRoot.description: Cherished as a fragrant anointing oil to calm warriors before battle, and a staple of love potions.

coll_camphor.name: Camphor
coll_camphor.description: A gift of the evergreen tree, symbol of life amongst death, this fragrant white compound possesses many spiritual properties.  Witches of both alignments would do well to offer this substance to the creator during the new moon.

coll_capsicum.name: Capsicum
coll_capsicum.description: An enhancement to any potion or spell crafted by fire, and/or dealing with the fiery emotions associated with heartache, or passions driven by anger. Strong protective properties.

coll_carawaySeed.name: Caraway Seed
coll_carawaySeed.description: If utilized with a honest heart, this seed safeguards property against theft as well as protects those in love from the wondering eye of lust.

coll_cedar.name: Cedar
coll_cedar.description: Cedar is primarily used for protection of a person and sacred places and may aid in the summoning of helpful spirits.

coll_chamomile.name: Chamomile
coll_chamomile.description: Chamomile is associated with the sun, Leo and the element of water. It is used in spells for money, peace, love, tranquility and purification.

coll_clove.name: Clove
coll_clove.description: Soothing to the troubled digestive system and a preferable treatment over that of the black slime. A princely spice for those of exaggerated, and over used canine teeth.

coll_cockComb.name: Cock's Comb
coll_cockComb.description: Otherwise the Amaranth, sacred to the Aztecs. A crown may be made for the head to improve healing, the dried leaves may ease communication with the dead. German witches claim the red variety aids in spells of deception.

coll_datura.name: Datura
coll_datura.description: Many Datura species have white flowers and only bloom at night giving them a strong relationship with the moon. It is used primarily to hex and remove hexes. It is also known to induce sleep and dreams of the future.

coll_saltDeadsea.name: Dead Sea Salt
coll_saltDeadsea.description: Uses include cleansing crystals, grounding, protection magic and ritual. Used on the altar to represent the Earth. Used with water for blessing, consecration and casting circles.

coll_nightShade.name: Deadly Nightshade
coll_nightShade.description: All witches are drawn to the deadly belladonna, but far too many believe they possess the wisdom to harness its beautiful power. The wrong signature is death, but the right may make your name among the old sisters.

coll_tongueDeer.name: Deer's Tongue
coll_tongueDeer.description: Resembling a tongue, this plant grants a witch easy eloquence, allowing clear pronunciation of difficult spells.

coll_bitDevil.name: Devil's Bit
coll_bitDevil.description: The short root so angered practitioners of plague that its rosette head is frequently bitten off by the devil, angry at the plant's ability to cure flesh meant to fester.

coll_dogBane.name: Dogbane
coll_dogBane.description: Dogbane is known as the brave plant that enjoys casting shadows, often used to make hidden spirits visible.

coll_dragonBlood.name: Dragon's Blood
coll_dragonBlood.description: Colored like dried blood, and carried most practically in resin form so that it might be burned, dissolved in liquid, or sprinkled about the practitioner for a multitude of powerful purposes.

coll_elder.name: Elder
coll_elder.description: Berries of both sustenance and poison, a portal tree establishing passage between the world of the Fay and the Mortal.  The gravediggers and hearse coachman's talisman against hauntings.

coll_eucalyptus.name: Eucalyptus
coll_eucalyptus.description: Bound to the water and moon. Spell craft favors the plant infused with candles of blue and green only if set within a ring.

coll_eyeBright.name: Eye Bright
coll_eyeBright.description: Eyebright is associated with the element of air, the sun, and Leo and with the Tower Tarot card. Used in spells to help avoid or remove deception and to make spirits seen.

coll_newtEye.name: Eye of Newt
coll_newtEye.description: The pungent mustard seed is a miniscule agent of confusion. Used improperly it can addle the mind of the practitioner, but used well it can be helpful to a cunning witch.

coll_fennel.name: Fennel
coll_fennel.description: The Sons of Enoch mention fennel as a favorite herb of John Dee in summoning a more passive spirit. Queer results are known, but use of fennel may sharpen the tongue and memory.

coll_fingerGrass.name: Five Finger Grass
coll_fingerGrass.description: Shaped roughly as a hand, this grass is foundational to many a Hoodoo curse, and also appreciated by those who delve into the interpretation of dreams. Aids the memory, inspires confidence.

coll_foxGlove.name: Foxglove
coll_foxGlove.description: Useful to destroy the living, and to raise the dead.  Collect the fallen damps from its petals will allow a practitioner to more easily commune with the Fay as well as the easing of a broken heart. Carefully burned during séance it increases contact with the dead, perhaps by killing the participants.

coll_frangipani.name: Frangipani
coll_frangipani.description: A favorite of the young, attracts love, trust, and admiration while promoting openness by those around.

coll_frankincense.name: Frankincense
coll_frankincense.description: Trust the Orphic Hymns or not, the burning of frankincense is likely to please your patron. The smoke of frankincense purifies the air, consider burning in a censer for clarity of thought.

coll_galangal.name: Galangal
coll_galangal.description: Staple of tribunal ceremony and commonly reserved for the wise among us. Nurtures the fires within, aids in focus.

coll_garlic.name: Garlic
coll_garlic.description: It is said Roman soldiers ate garlic before battle for strength and bravery and it was used in various ways during the plague, as well as to ward off evil spirits, protection from vampires, the evil eye and protection from hexes.

coll_geranium.name: Geranium
coll_geranium.description: A tea infused with wild Geranium flowers might provide an effective counter to spells of romance. A bit of the root can be carried as an amulet to attract happiness and prosperity though it should be replaced every third day. It can also be used in spells to encourage sympathy.

coll_ghostOrchid.name: Ghost Orchid
coll_ghostOrchid.description: The embodiment of the forest wives, lovely spirits that are always friends to witches. Draw this flower carefully beneath a dark moon to maximize its potency.

coll_hawthorn.name: Hawthorn
coll_hawthorn.description: Hawthorn is a sacred tree in many Pagan religions. Used to prevent people and spirits from entering a sacred place. May be used in many protection spells.

coll_hazel.name: Hazel
coll_hazel.description: One of the nine traditional woods burned in the Balefire by the Druids at Beltaine, burned for wisdom. Known in ancient times as the “Tree of Wisdom”. Used for a myriad of spells including controlling spirits, hexing, protection, and divination.

coll_heather.name: Heather
coll_heather.description: Heather can be used to change the appearance, and improve beauty. May be used in protection spells and to summon friendly spirits and against violent spirits.

coll_heliotrope.name: Heliotrope
coll_heliotrope.description: For those afflicted by unrequited love, experiencing the presence of this plant as it follows the sun mollifies the humors often giving rise to gaiety. One should take heed, however, that too much time in such a place can cause emotional invisibility.

coll_hellebore.name: Hellebore
coll_hellebore.description: Lovely flowers that might push through the snow if planted where tears have once fallen.  An ancient cure for madness, though more poisonous than most lunacy.

coll_hemlock.name: Hemlock
coll_hemlock.description: Though characteristically used in the anointing of weaponry, its obscure but most powerful use is in the anointment of a talisman gifted to someone closed that you wish to open to debate.  Or, just use it as a poison.

coll_henbane.name: Henbane
coll_henbane.description: Henbane is crucial in times of drought leading into the battle for the harvest.  Toss into water with prayers and supplication to bring the rain.  Be watchful for Banshee attending the spell driven weather. Useful to flavor ales. Induces delirium.

coll_honeySuckle.name: Honeysuckle
coll_honeySuckle.description: Soften your spellcraft with honeysuckle. Known to induce amorous dreams, this sweet blossom may not empower your works, but may seduce your subject, albeit briefly.

coll_hyacinth.name: Hyacinth
coll_hyacinth.description: Promotes peace of mind and peaceful sleep. Attracts love, luck, and good fortune. Best used when the rainbow adorns the sky. Guards against nightmares when used as an oil, burned as incense, or dusted upon the pillow. Carry in an amulet or sachet to ease grief or the pain of childbirth.

coll_hyssop.name: Hyssop
coll_hyssop.description: Hyssop is the fragrant herb often used to freshen homes, particularly the kitchen. It is used for spells of healing and protection and to counter hexes.

coll_jasmine.name: Jasmine
coll_jasmine.description: The most widely used purification herb in all worship. Lightens vibrations and promotes spiritual opening.

coll_juniper.name: Juniper
coll_juniper.description: In rare signatures, could induce prophetic visions; explore its use against wasting afflictions. Never to be used in magic against vampires.

coll_juniperBerry.name: Juniper Berry
coll_juniperBerry.description: Juniper berries have been found in multiple Egyptian tombs, though the plant is not a known native.The berries may be used for healing and to both give and restore strength and stamina.

coll_lavender.name: Lavender
coll_lavender.description: Insipid and innocuous, but sweetens your magic well enough. Some benefit beyond the perfume is lesser known, but there is little harm in trying.

coll_lemonVerbena.name: Lemon Verbena
coll_lemonVerbena.description: Lemon Verbena, thought of as the breakup herb, is used to hex and cause strife between allies.

coll_lemongrass.name: Lemongrass
coll_lemongrass.description: In folklore lemongrass is said to repel dragons and serpents. Lemongrass is often used for cleansing and repelling evil, healing, protection, and mind controlling spells.

coll_licorice.name: Licorice
coll_licorice.description: Licorice root was often buried with the dead to help the soul pass to the other side. Also known as the passion root. Used to expel negative energy and protect from hexes. Licorice is one of the Nine Sacred Herbs of protection.

coll_lilac.name: Lilac
coll_lilac.description: Lilac is known for its lovely but sometimes obnoxious scent. Used to mask the scent of the dead and for various warding spells. Lilac is also used for the banishment of negative energies.

coll_lilyValley.name: Lily of the Valley
coll_lilyValley.description: Lily of the Valley is often cherished for its symbolism.The herb of peace, tranquility, and purity. Lily of the Valley works well with other healing herbs to bolster their healing power, and may be used to heal and protect.

coll_lobelia.name: Lobelia
coll_lobelia.description: One of the herbs of Neptune. Often used in hexing and when combined with other herbs the effects can be particularly powerful and often unpredictable.

coll_lotus.name: Lotus
coll_lotus.description: Lotus is the flower of the moon and venus leaving the mark of tranquility. It is most often used in spells of protection.

coll_mandrake.name: Mandrake
coll_mandrake.description: Taken from black soil, a nightmare; from poor soil, more suitable for your designs. Read the shape closely to consider innate inclinations and harvest at dusk for more potency.

coll_mangrove.name: Mangrove
coll_mangrove.description: Mangrove are said to represent a doorway to the Otherworld. Mangrove may be used for spells of protection and possibly to aid in the summoning of spirits. It's also a splendid aid for other similar herbs.

coll_mimosa.name: Mimosa
coll_mimosa.description: Mimosa is said to have many qualities including purification, love, and sight into the Otherworld. Mimosa is best used in protection and in the aid of other protection spells.

coll_mistleToe.name: Mistletoe
coll_mistleToe.description: Carrying a sprig on your person will ensure good luck, protection and fertility. Hanging it in the home protects against disease, lightening, werewolves, and having your children switched with faerie changelings. Warring coven leaders will often present mistletoe to one another during periods of truce.

coll_moly.name: Moly
coll_moly.description: In the story the Odyssey, it was this herb that Hermes gave to Odysseus to protect him from Circe's sorcery. Moly is used in spells of protection and to aid other herbs in a similar way.

coll_motherwort.name: Motherwort
coll_motherwort.description: Motherwort was first used by the Greeks to soothe the worry of pregnant women and in other cultures to relieve pain. Most often used in healing, but known to counter spells and to protect.

coll_mugwort.name: Mugwort
coll_mugwort.description: It's possible Mugwort got it's name from flavoring beverages, the same beverages one would drink from a mug. Mugwort is most commonly thought to aid in both protection and healing spells.

coll_mullein.name: Mullein
coll_mullein.description: Otherwise the Hag's Taper, it's golden bloom serves as a lantern in the darkness of the Otherworld. The soft leaves were burned in the censers of powerful witches as they fought the Mallochio in the Ember Wars. It belongs to the golden hour after dawn. Its rich dye is used to color the robes of the mysterious Rose Handed Coven.

coll_nettle.name: Nettle
coll_nettle.description: Hippocrates recorded 61 medicinal uses of the nettle in the fourth and fifth centuries. The nettle has been used to drive out unwanted spirits and negative energy and to break hexes.

coll_oakmoss.name: Oakmoss
coll_oakmoss.description: Once used for packing embalmed mummies, today there are few high-classed perfumes without oakmoss oil. Used mostly for protection spells, it may also have some use in healing when applied with other spells.

coll_orrisRoot.name: Orris Root
coll_orrisRoot.description: Orris Root is considered one of the plants of the moon and most often associated with dreamwork and divination.

coll_parisNight.name: Paris Nightshade
coll_parisNight.description: Favored ingredient for the shape shifter as its effects are gentle rather than bone crackingly violent, particularly good for shifting to the wild boar.

coll_parsley.name: Parsley
coll_parsley.description: Parsley has been associated with Death, and should be used to decorate tombs as well as dinner plates. Never grow it indoors, unless you want death invited into the house.  Wearing it on your head protects from inebriation. Only pregnant women and witches grow parsley properly and know that it should be planted on Good Friday for the best crop. Mistreatment of parsley brings bad luck.

coll_patchouli.name: Patchouli
coll_patchouli.description: Strong aromatic used in spells, sachets, baths and mixtures for money and love. Put in the wallet or purse to attract money. Place in a charm or use in incense for fertility. Helps to ground you and bring your consciousness back to the physical level.

coll_pennyRoyal.name: Pennyroyal
coll_pennyRoyal.description: Place in your shoes to keep you from tiring when walking long distances, or from motion sickness upon the seas. Good for spells removing the evil eye.  Place on a candle prior to difficult meetings.

coll_pine.name: Pine
coll_pine.description: Promotes new beginnings, clean breaks, prosperity, success, strength, grounding, and growth; Also used for cleansing, purification, and repelling negativity. Good idea to use when seeking to change alignments.

coll_poppy.name: Poppy
coll_poppy.description: Poppy promotes fertility, prosperity, love and abundance.

coll_queenMeadow.name: Queen of the Meadow
coll_queenMeadow.description: A leaf tucked into your cheek may ensure that words spoken to the opposite sex will be well-received. Gamblers carry the plant to bring them good luck. Carrying the plant with you will also encourage others to look upon you with respect.

coll_redAlder.name: Red Alder
coll_redAlder.description: Draws its strength from water, turns water to blood. Chewed by the witches of old Germany as they celebrated Saturnalia on The Brocken. Not to be trifled with, may induce a crossing of the hedge.

coll_roseGeranium.name: Rose Geranium
coll_roseGeranium.description: Averts negativity.  Slip a potion to a gossip to end false accusations.

coll_rosemary.name: Rosemary
coll_rosemary.description: Clear mindedness and sharpened intellect can be found in the properties of Rosemary, especially when the scent is carried upon the ocean breeze.

coll_rowan.name: Rowan
coll_rowan.description: A life giver, perfect for wands and divining rods.  Poltergeists particularly avoid Rowan handlers, though Rowan properties invite psychic powers.

coll_rue.name: Rue
coll_rue.description: A cleansing herb used in sprinkling holy water, purported to be one of the ingredients in the Thieves Vinegar used to battle the plague.  A bitter for ceremonial drink.

coll_johnWort.name: Saint John's Wort
coll_johnWort.description: St. John's Wort has been used for healing for thousands of years and takes its name from St. John the Baptist. The bloody red color seems more appropriate for the use of expelling particularly evil spirits.

coll_sanPedro.name: San Pedro
coll_sanPedro.description: This cactus has been a primary staple of the Peruvian Shaman for thousands of years.  Commonly used to diagnose and cure illness.

coll_sandalWood.name: Sandalwood
coll_sandalWood.description: The oil extracted by steam distillation from this sacred wood is wonderfully rare and used for protection, exorcism, and healing wounds. Careful to minimize its use near All Saints Eve as the undead embalmed by the oil may seek answers to their restless wanderings.

coll_sassafras.name: Sassafras
coll_sassafras.description: This aromatic tree is part of the laurel family, as versatile as any botanical, it has served to provide distinctive flavor to drinks and as a cure-all for Native Americans. While less potent for witchcraft, it should add a little something extra to your magic.

coll_slipperyElm.name: Slippery Elm
coll_slipperyElm.description: Tall, slim and stately, this tree's inner bark can be used in a multitude of healing rites, spells, and potions.  It is the bane of jealous slander as this plant effectively shuts the mouth of a gossip.

coll_snakeroot.name: Snakeroot
coll_snakeroot.description: Also called the Black Cohosh, this root was well used in the Ember Wars to empower protective wards. Often used in thresholds to prevent the passing of evil spirits, but some prefer to burn it as the smoke is considered a bane to evil.

coll_solomonSeal.name: Solomon's Seal
coll_solomonSeal.description: Incense. Keeps sacred oaths & promises forever binding. Keep on altar to promote success in all rituals. Sprinkle an infusion of the root to drive away evil.

coll_spiceBush.name: Spicebush
coll_spiceBush.description: Also the Fever Bush, once used by the Native Americans to cure a litany of ailments, the wood witches and barrow sisters have learned clever uses for Spicebush.

coll_thyme.name: Thyme
coll_thyme.description: Thyme can be used in spells to increase strength, courage and an indominable spirit.  A paste rubbed upon your shoulders will lighten your melancholy, hopelessness and other negative vibrations.  Known to attract fairies to your garden.

coll_frogToe.name: Toe of Frog
coll_frogToe.description: This darling buttercup belies its unlovely name. Common, it's use in witchcraft may be more for style than substance. Or simply to pay homage to those weird sisters.

coll_dogTongue.name: Tongue of Dog
coll_dogTongue.description: Poisonous and harmful to cows and pastures. Used long ago in old Europe to cure sore throats, coughs, and mouth sores. The wayward sisters find a love for this piece.

coll_tormentil.name: Tormentil
coll_tormentil.description: The old witches of Appalachia called it bloodroot. Tormentil was used to burn away negative energies, and it's root served as substitute for blood in working their signatures.

coll_vervain.name: Vervain
