coll_vervain.description: A favorite of the Baba Yaga and other wood witches, it's healing powers may be as strong as any herb. It is a powerful supplement to many signatures and used frequently as a bane to vampires. It's effectiveness here is debated among witches.

coll_vetivert.name: Vetivert
coll_vetivert.description: A common ground plant with an effective root for simple magic. It serves as a mild calming agent to witches, keeping them in balance and inviting restorative sleep.

coll_willow.name: Willow
coll_willow.description: The willow is considered a sacred wishing tree whose northward facing branches hold the sway of the new moon, the southward branches that the full moon, the eastward waning gibbous, and the westward  waxing gibbous. Tell a willow your wish under the correct conditions and it will come true. Choose the wrong branches and the opposite may likely occur.

coll_witchEgg.name: Witch Egg
coll_witchEgg.description: This rare variety of pungent fungus must be taken in it's earliest egg-sack stage to be useful. If you can suffer the odor, this toadstool can fortify powerful spells.

coll_wolfClaw.name: Wolf Claw
coll_wolfClaw.description: Used frequently and in a multitude of ways by the Celtic druids, it was woven into robes and bound in protective amulets. To honor the druids only harvest with your left and bare of foot.

coll_wolfBane.name: Wolfsbane
coll_wolfBane.description: The loveliness of this mountain flower is deceptive, it is very toxic. To a practiced witch, it can be used to prevent lycanthropes and other shape-shifters from changing form, but it also serves many spells that hope to inflict harm.

coll_batWool.name: Wool of Bat
coll_batWool.description: Once used to invoke magnificent results, the modern witches have found less use for holly. It does bring some peace and cheer to the witch, and perhaps it's old powers have hidden some undiscovered signature.

coll_cinnamon.name: Cinnamon
coll_cinnamon.description: Commonly used in incense. It can help with upset stomachs, or as an ingredient in healing teas.

coll_clover.name: Clover
coll_clover.description: Clovers are used for protection and love. A two-leaf clover can find you love, a three-leaf clover can protect you, a four-leaf clover can ward off harmful spells, and a five-leaf clover can attract money.

coll_coriander.name: Coriander
coll_coriander.description: Coriander can promote peace and love, or ease the pain of loss. This herb is great for bodily and spiritual repair, alertness, and motivation.

coll_bloodAgate.name: Blood Agate
coll_bloodAgate.description: Infused with the blood of vampire-kind.

coll_brimstone.name: Brimstone
coll_brimstone.description: Burning with the lightless fires of the Underworld.

coll_demonEye.name: Demon's Eye
coll_demonEye.description: Rich for rarity. Do not look too long upon this stone.

coll_malachite.name: Malachite
coll_malachite.description: The travelers stone. No two are alike.

coll_motherTear.name: Mother's Tear
coll_motherTear.description: The tear of the moon. The fair mother of dreams.

spell_seal.conditionDescription: Sealed! Power and Resilience is reduced.

spell_bargain.conditionDescription: Invisible! Only visible to those with the power of Truesight. Using any magic will dispel this effect.

spell_ward.conditionDescription: Clarity! Chance of success with spells is increased.

spell_sealBalance.conditionDescription: Seal of Balance! Resilience and Power are improved.

spell_invisibility.conditionDescription: Invisible! Only visible to those with the power of Truesight. Using any magic will dispel this effect.

spell_trueSight.conditionDescription: Truesight! Can see what is not meant to be seen within 3 kilometers.

spell_hex.conditionDescription: Hexed! 5% more vulnerable to critical attacks.

spell_bind.conditionDescription: Bound! Unable to Fly or leave a Place of Power until Bind wears off or it is dispelled.

spell_wither.conditionDescription: Withering! Bound to this location and suffering damage. If not dispelled, Withed will do more damage on expiration.

spell_sealShadow.conditionDescription: Seal of Shadow! Resilience is now improved.

spell_wail.conditionDescription: Damage will be taken in a radius around the caster.

spell_rageWard.conditionDescription: Rage Ward! At low energy, Power will be doubled.

spell_shadowfeet.conditionDescription: Power has been increased, but damage will be dealt.

spell_bless.conditionDescription: Blessed! Resilience has increased. Taking less damage while Blessed.

spell_silence.conditionDescription: Silenced! Unable to cast until Silence wears off or is dispelled.

spell_sealLight.conditionDescription: Seal of Light! Power is now improved.

spell_reflectiveWard.conditionDescription: Reflective Ward! Half of all incoming damage will be reflected back to the attacker.

spell_shadowMark.conditionDescription: Mary's Kiss! If dispelled this curse will cause significant damage to the witch that is afflicted and the witch that dispels it.

spell_crowsEye.conditionDescription: Crow's Eye! Can see what is not meant to be seen anywhere in the world.

spell_greaterSeal.conditionDescription: Greater Seal! Power and Resilience are significantly reduced.

spell_greaterBless.conditionDescription: Greater Blessing! Resilience has significantly increased. Taking significantly less damage while Blessed.

spell_greaterHex.conditionDescription: Greater Hex! Significantly more vulnerable to critical attacks.

spell_twilightDusk.conditionDescription: Twilight Dusk! Power is increased. Resilience is reduced.

spell_twilightDawn.conditionDescription: Twilight Dawn! Resilience is increased. Power is reduced.

elixir_xp.conditionDescription: Elixir of Experience active. Gives XP boost for all your actions.

elixir_degree.conditionDescription: Elixir of Alignment active. Gives Alignment boost when casting spells.

spirit_aatxe.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_aatxe.spiritDescription: My life belongs to Mari. I am the rider of storms and keeper of Her earthly treasures.

spirit_abata.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Harvester. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Gathers nearby collectibles for its summoner. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_abata.spiritDescription: I am queen of the marshes. The black waters are my dominion. Old secrets lie with me.

spirit_abchanchu.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_abchanchu.spiritDescription: I am old and gouty handed. Come close and I will share the wisdom of my days.

spirit_abeonaAdeona.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Resurrector. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Resurrects its summoner and allies. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_abeonaAdeona.spiritDescription: As sisters, we serve as guardians of wayward souls. We hold dominion over departures and wandering and give comfort to lost children.

spirit_abiku.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_abiku.spiritDescription: Never sated, I drink your spirit with relish. Where I traverse pestilence follows.

spirit_abkaHehe.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_abkaHehe.spiritDescription: I am the triple goddess, mother of earth and light. I give birth to spirits of light and live to cast the wicked from the earthly plane.

spirit_abnoba.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_abnoba.spiritDescription: Keeper of sacred springs and spirit of the deep forest. Born among the Celts I now travel the waters far and wide in the world.

spirit_acat.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_acat.spiritDescription: Long venerated by the Mayans, I am patron to the artists of the flesh.

spirit_accaLarentia.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_accaLarentia.spiritDescription: I am benefactress of my beloved Rome. A siren of the Seven Hills. Few spirits can match my wealth, none my beauty.

spirit_acheri.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> India. </color>
spirit_acheri.spiritDescription: The filth of mankind constitutes my life and my breath. I go as the child of innocent form, but my breath is disease.

spirit_aegir.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_aegir.spiritDescription: Primeval spirit of the sea, I was ancient when the earth still lived beneath the waves. I live to host and bring cheer to the halls of man and gods alike.

spirit_aeronwen.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_aeronwen.spiritDescription: From atop the old green hills I see the fate of battles before the first skull is cracked. I am a shield for those humble enough to call upon me.

spirit_aganyu.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Africa. </color>
spirit_aganyu.spiritDescription: My beating heart is fashioned from the black soil. I am a primordial dweller in the deepest quarters of the earth, when I lift my breath the earth heaves.

spirit_agni.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> India. </color>
spirit_agni.spiritDescription: I am the Hindu God of Fire, Lightning, the Sun, and of Hearth. Perform a dance of fire in my honor and it will please me greatly.

spirit_agogwe.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Africa. </color>
spirit_agogwe.spiritDescription: You'll find me deep in the jungles of Africa. Some say I don't exist, and some say I do. It's up to you to find me and prove them wrong, or right.

spirit_agwe.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Caribbean. </color>
spirit_agwe.spiritDescription: I am the loa of the sea, and patron of the sailors. My waters are free for your exploration, given that you protect them as I do.

spirit_ahool.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Asia. </color>
spirit_ahool.spiritDescription: I ride the night winds on dusky wings. My cry is a call to the spirits of the night.

spirit_aife.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_aife.spiritDescription: I am shaman, sorceress and maiden of the sword and lance. My love is war. My rival is Scatach, though I am her better.

spirit_aine.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_aine.spiritDescription: My eyes are lit by the sun, the summer is my favored season, my bower is the sunlit glade.

spirit_alakshmi.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> India. </color>
spirit_alakshmi.spiritDescription: Don't confuse me with Lakshmi- I am the goddess of grief and despair. You won't have a happy experience if you encounter me.

spirit_alcyone.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_alcyone.spiritDescription: Like Aeronwen I see what has not yet come to pass. The black hyded raven is my familiar and the speaker of my fortunes.

spirit_altamaha.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_altamaha.spiritDescription: The base of the Altamaha River is my home. I live my life in secrecy and keep alive the legend of my existence.

spirit_aluqa.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Middle East. </color>
spirit_aluqa.spiritDescription: I and my daughters are leechers of life drawing upon blood and spirit alike. We crawl as the insect and seduce as the irresistable maiden.

spirit_amFear.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_amFear.spiritDescription: I am the big grey man that wanders the passes of Ben MacDhui. Those that fear me do not know me, for I am a watchman for the adventurers of my realm.

spirit_amberella.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Slavic Countries. </color>
spirit_amberella.spiritDescription: Once human, I am now the princess of the deep ocean. When I long to shore I will often leave gifts of amber in my wake.

spirit_ammit.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Africa. </color>
spirit_ammit.spiritDescription: I am the devourer of the dead. I rest in the underworld, and feed off of the souls I call my meals.

spirit_andraste.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_andraste.spiritDescription: I am a bringer of luck, my presence is courage to the anxious. I was the wind behind Boudica's revolt. My devotees find victory in my inspiration.

spirit_angerboda.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_angerboda.spiritDescription: I delight in the mystery of my true nature, for few among man know me well. I am a friend to witches, and give my guidance when I please. I have been known to travel in crow form.

spirit_angerona.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_angerona.spiritDescription: I am protectress of Rome and keeper of her secrets, I shall hold her true name for eternity.

spirit_anhanga.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_anhanga.spiritDescription: I have known death, but death does not keep me. I can take many forms but favor the fire-eyed stag. I am only happy in wandering and sporting with frail human minds.

spirit_aoandon.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Trickster. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Unpredictably casts a random spell on any witch. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_aoandon.spiritDescription: One hundred blue lanterns burn against the night. I will walk the edge of the shadows until the last light is spent. Your fear is my delight.

spirit_apep.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Africa. </color>
spirit_apep.spiritDescription: I am the bringer of chaos. The Underworld rumbles at the sound of my great roar, casting fear into the hearts of many.

spirit_apsara.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> India. </color>
spirit_apsara.spiritDescription: I am the dancer of the Gandharvas' music that echo deep in the gods' palaces. I provide entertainment and sometimes more to the magnificent.

spirit_ascalaphus.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Familiar. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Follows its summoner and attacks its enemies. </color>
 Commonly found:<color=#FFFFFF99> Worldwide. </color>
spirit_ascalaphus.spiritDescription: I once pressed the orchard grass with my bare feet, now I crawl among the rocks. Pleasure abounds in the touch of the earth.

spirit_attercroppe.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_attercroppe.spiritDescription: I am the little poison head. My deeds are more mishief than malice. Upon my word, I promise good behavior.

spirit_aurora.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_aurora.spiritDescription: I am the spirit of the Northern Lights. People come to my domains to see my show and admire my gift of light.

spirit_austeja.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Slavic Countries. </color>
spirit_austeja.spiritDescription: I am protectress of bees and guardian of families. I especially watch over women-with-child. Honey is sacred to me.

spirit_axehandle.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_axehandle.spiritDescription: You'll find me wandering about in Minnesota and Wisconsin deep in the night. Be careful not to leave your axes out- you might find them handle-less by morning.

spirit_ayida.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Caribbean. </color>
spirit_ayida.spiritDescription: I am the Rainbow Serpent, the loa of fertility, rainbows, wind, water, fire, and snakes. Offer me white eggs, rice, or milk and I will share with you my secrets.

spirit_ayizan.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Caribbean. </color>
spirit_ayizan.spiritDescription: I am the loa of marketplace and commerce. I keep with my many secrets and mysteries, to that which I will share with those who serve the Vodou correctly.

spirit_azaka.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Caribbean. </color>
spirit_azaka.spiritDescription: I am the loa of the harvest. I am a kind and gentle soul who loves to eat; come, share a meal with me.

spirit_babaYaga.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Slavic Countries. </color>
spirit_babaYaga.spiritDescription: I am no eater of children! They are far too stringy. My false reputation is owed to the deception of wicked step mothers, for I am a giver of justice and sharer of forest wisdom.

spirit_badbh.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_badbh.spiritDescription: I am the battle crow. I move easily between the realms of the living and the dead. I carry secrets of the otherworld, for a price.

spirit_bakeneko.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_bakeneko.spiritDescription: I am the silent feline. I am gentle, and you will hear the chirp of a cricket before you hear my approach.

spirit_bakru.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_bakru.spiritDescription: Made of flesh and yew, I am small but my heart is a clutch of flames. When I traffic among man I keep to passages and bridgeways.

spirit_baku.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_baku.spiritDescription: I am the eater of foul dreams. Try my name three times and I will drink the nightmares from your brain.

spirit_banamuHehe.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_banamuHehe.spiritDescription: I am the Earth Mother. I form a triad with Abka Hehe and Ulden Hehe. Respect nature, and you will have my gratitude.

spirit_banaspati.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Asia. </color>
spirit_banaspati.spiritDescription: Red of flesh and sharp of horn, I draw my strength from the anger of mankind. I wear your anger like a wreath of flame.

spirit_banshee.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects allied witches in a Death state. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_banshee.spiritDescription: I am born of the green glens of my ancient homeland, a sleeper of the mound. I am a watcher of noble families and sometimes sing the secrets of the dead.

spirit_baobhanSith.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_baobhanSith.spiritDescription: I am come of the Scottish Highlands, but now journey the world over. The blood of huntsman is my drink of choice, his will is no match to my persuasion.

spirit_barghest.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Familiar. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Follows its summoner and attacks its enemies. </color>
 Commonly found:<color=#FFFFFF99> Worldwide. </color>
spirit_barghest.spiritDescription: I am a spectral hound loyal to my summoner. I will protect them with my life, and stay by their side at all times.

spirit_befana.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_befana.spiritDescription: I've been carrying gifts to the young since the ancient times. I keep my home in the forests of Italy.

spirit_begtse.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Asia. </color>
spirit_begtse.spiritDescription: I once rode as the lord of war spiriting the horde of Genghis Khan! I still serve as the guardian of Mongolia, but I'm always up for an adventure!

spirit_belenus.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_belenus.spiritDescription: Once beloved as a shining deity, I am enjoying an age of peaceful obscurity. I keep to my flocks in the sunlit meadows, but I may be called upon for spiritual errands.

spirit_belieBelcan.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Caribbean. </color>
spirit_belieBelcan.spiritDescription: I am a shield to honorable witches and devoted to the service of my summoner.

spirit_benten.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_benten.spiritDescription: I am daughter of the dragon king. I dwell beneath Lake Biwa by Kyoto. If love is your purpose, I shall guide you.

spirit_bigfoot.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_bigfoot.spiritDescription: It is I, the legend itself. Some will see me wandering in the woods, some will mistake me, and some will say I do not exist. Only the wisest will know the truth.

spirit_boggart.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Trickster. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Unpredictably casts a random spell on any witch. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_boggart.spiritDescription: Mishcief is my game. I make my home in the houses of man. I may turn your milk or hobble your hound, but malicious? Never in life!

spirit_booHag.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_booHag.spiritDescription: I am the skinless skin thief. I often walk in others' skins, hiding my true raw self. My victims' breaths are my blood, giving me power and life.

spirit_boromu.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Africa. </color>
spirit_boromu.spiritDescription: I am a lord of ash and desiccation. I am coughed from the stomachs of old gods. I bring withering and weakness upon mankind.

spirit_brockenSpectre.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Familiar. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Follows its summoner and attacks its enemies. </color>
 Commonly found:<color=#FFFFFF99> Worldwide. </color>
spirit_brockenSpectre.spiritDescription: I am the spirit of The Brocken. Let your eyes rest upon me and my form shall become a mirror of your soul.

spirit_bruxaEvora.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_bruxaEvora.spiritDescription: I am more wise and more beautiful than any living witch. I am a wellspring of mystic knowledge and will share secrets in return for adulation.

spirit_buda.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Africa. </color>
spirit_buda.spiritDescription: I am the power of the Evil Eye. Often in the form of a hyena, I will stalk my victims and show them my true nature.

spirit_bunyip.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Harvester. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Gathers nearby collectibles for its summoner. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Oceania. </color>
spirit_bunyip.spiritDescription: I thrive in the dark waters of Australia. Rumors of my wicked nature are false, for I care little for the ways of man. For those few that I favor I will give protection.

spirit_caipora.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_caipora.spiritDescription: I prefer to keep to the shadowy fastness of the forests, turning my feet to trick my followers. While I have little concern for man, the right gift can earn my favor.

spirit_callisto.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_callisto.spiritDescription: In my spirit form I come as the bear. My voice is weak but my strength is formidable. Honey and sweets will bring out the best in my temperament.

spirit_camazotz.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Central America. </color>
spirit_camazotz.spiritDescription: I am the Snatch Bat, a black winged agent of death. The noble heroes of Maya were no match for me, what makes you think you'll have a chance?

spirit_catSidhe.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Familiar. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Follows its summoner and attacks its enemies. </color>
 Commonly found:<color=#FFFFFF99> Worldwide. </color>
spirit_catSidhe.spiritDescription: There can be no more gentle companion to witches. I am here to serve.

spirit_chantico.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_chantico.spiritDescription: The flames of time light my spirit. At rest, I take the form of the red serpent. I am a willing guardian of witches.

spirit_charities.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_charities.spiritDescription: I have served witches old and young for centuries. I am one of the noble Graces, but you need not be noble to win my favor.

spirit_chelone.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_chelone.spiritDescription: Once a nymph of the mountain passes, I now enjoy my days in the form of a turtle. Never interfere with the love affairs of gods.

spirit_choncon.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_choncon.spiritDescription: The span of my wings will conceal the stars above you as I hunt the moonless night, and as your loved ones slumber, I will nourish from their blood.

spirit_chthonian.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Familiar. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Follows its summoner and attacks its enemies. </color>
 Commonly found:<color=#FFFFFF99> Worldwide. </color>
spirit_chthonian.spiritDescription: I am a spirit of the earth, I prefer to keep my time upon the surface to a minimum.

spirit_chupacabra.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_chupacabra.spiritDescription: I was first sighted in Puerto Rico, then made my way to the United States to feed on the abundance of livestock. This has earned me the name "the goatsucker."

spirit_cindaku.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Asia. </color>
spirit_cindaku.spiritDescription: I have the mind of man and the form of the tiger. While my history with man has been turbulent, I will occasionally serve a capable witch with a good cause.

spirit_cipelahq.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_cipelahq.spiritDescription: I am the fierce eyed spirit of the night. I come as prince of owls, my cries cause mothers to hush their babes.

spirit_coventina.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_coventina.spiritDescription: I take my strength from the sacred springs of Northumberland. I owe my healing powers to these waters.

spirit_curupira.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Trickster. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Unpredictably casts a random spell on any witch. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_curupira.spiritDescription: I delight in the animals and plants of the wild, but perhaps I delight in confounding the axman, poacher, and those harmful the nature just a bit more.

spirit_dapperSkeleton.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Familiar. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Follows its summoner and attacks its enemies. </color>
 Commonly found:<color=#FFFFFF99> Worldwide. </color>
spirit_dapperSkeleton.spiritDescription: I am the mascot of the Day of the Dead. Although my origins are in Mexico, influence and culture has brought me around the globe to share my dapperness with all.

spirit_djab.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Caribbean. </color>
spirit_djab.spiritDescription: I am an unabashed spirit for hire, here to provide magical talents to the highest bidder.

spirit_djinn.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Middle East. </color>
spirit_djinn.spiritDescription: We are old and many, fashioned of flames we are masters of many forms. We are a moody race, let us hope that you've caught me at the right time.

spirit_dropBear.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Oceania. </color>
spirit_dropBear.spiritDescription: Do not mistake me for my gentle cousin, for I am not so meek. Please me and I serve as an able guardian of sacred places.

spirit_dryad.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_dryad.spiritDescription: I come of an old and noble race. Arbiters of the wood, I am made strong from the sinews of the forest. To serve as your protrectress you have much to prove.

spirit_edimmu.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Asia. </color>
spirit_edimmu.spiritDescription: We served the vanguard of the Ember Wars. Now, the sweet blood of witches cries to us once more.

spirit_indio.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_indio.spiritDescription: I am an ancestral guardian of brave adventurers. If you bore me, witch, I will find another.

spirit_evilWind.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Middle East. </color>
spirit_evilWind.spiritDescription: I am the Last of the Seven. I am the Storm, the Evil Wind, and I take my vengeance.

spirit_farDarrig.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Trickster. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Unpredictably casts a random spell on any witch. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_farDarrig.spiritDescription: I'm no chancer puttin on airs. I'm the original Red Man and up for layin boots on whoever stands before me.

spirit_fossegrimen.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_fossegrimen.spiritDescription: I am the water fiddler. Give me a satisfying meal and I will be happy to share the secrets of my melodies.

spirit_fowler.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Familiar. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Follows its summoner and attacks its enemies. </color>
 Commonly found:<color=#FFFFFF99> Worldwide. </color>
spirit_fowler.spiritDescription: I have served human witches for centuries. I am a keen and cunning protector, albeit with a mind of my own. I stand against demonkind, but it is the vampire that I truly loath.

spirit_fuath.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_fuath.spiritDescription: My name means "hate" in Scottish Gaelic. Assume my personality the same.

spirit_fudo.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_fudo.spiritDescription: I am the Immutable One. The wisdom of many years grants me patience. With my rope I bind the wicked.

spirit_fukusuke.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_fukusuke.spiritDescription: I am a princely agent of good fortune. Prosperity thrives in my presence. The ringing of the merchant's bell pleases me.

spirit_furiousWolf.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Middle East. </color>
spirit_furiousWolf.spiritDescription: I am the Fifth of the Seven. I am the Furious Wolf, who knoweth not flee. Challenge me, and see who is the last to make a stand.

spirit_gabija.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_gabija.spiritDescription: Regarded as the Lithuanian spirit of fire, I am the protector of home and family. I take many forms, most commonly a cat, stork, or rooster.

spirit_gashadokuro.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_gashadokuro.spiritDescription: I am the starving skeleton. Wander into my sight and I will feed on your blood.

spirit_glaistig.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_glaistig.spiritDescription: Don't confuse me with Fuath. I am beautiful yet also monstrous, the Green Lady with the lower end of a goat.

spirit_goatman.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_goatman.spiritDescription: I was once an esteemed scientist who fell victim to an experiment gone wrong. Now I'm cursed with the legs and head of a goat. Please don't come for me, for I wish to remain in isolation until my misery comes to an end.

spirit_greatDragon.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Middle East. </color>
spirit_greatDragon.spiritDescription: I am the Second of the Seven. I am the Great Dragon, whose mouth is wide open. None can measure to my true and raw strength.

spirit_leopard.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> The Middle East. </color>
spirit_leopard.spiritDescription: I am the Third of the Seven. I am the Grim Leopard, who carries off the young. Keep them safe and away from me, for I take any and everything in my sight.

spirit_grindylow.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_grindylow.spiritDescription: I am deeply misunderstund, for my old kinsman have stained my name. Call upon me and I shall prove myself a worthy companion to witches.

spirit_hitotsume.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_hitotsume.spiritDescription: I am the Japanese cyclops. Give me a block of tofu and I will forever be your friend.

spirit_houndAnnwn.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_houndAnnwn.spiritDescription: No longer in service of my old Lord Annwn, I am ready to lead your hunt. Let the night not hold us back, for we have the blessing of Matilda!

spirit_huldra.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Nordic Countries. </color>
spirit_huldra.spiritDescription: My long golden hair houses my crown of flowers. I promise you, I am beautiful, but so many can't look past my wretched cow's tail. Please, somebody wed me so I can be free of it.

spirit_hyosube.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Trickster. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Unpredictably casts a random spell on any witch. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_hyosube.spiritDescription: If I make my home in yours, prepare to clean up my grimey, mucky hair from your, now my, bathtub.

spirit_inugami.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_inugami.spiritDescription: Be careful not to mistake me from an ordinary canine. The level of loyalty I provide depends on the jingle of change in your pocket.

spirit_itzamna.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_itzamna.spiritDescription: Lord of Night and Day, I am the first healer and patron to the scribes. I have little time for upstart witches.

spirit_itzpapalotl.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_itzpapalotl.spiritDescription: I am the Obsidian Butterfly, made of the bones of Mictlan and ruler of the realm of Tamoanchan.

spirit_jackolantern.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_jackolantern.spiritDescription: Carve a happy face, carve a scary face, it doesn't matter to me. Use a candle or a light, on the porch or in the street. Just be sure to mutter the words, "Trick or Treat!"

spirit_jerseyDevil.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> North America. </color>
spirit_jerseyDevil.spiritDescription: The Pine Barrens of New Jersey is my home. I move quickly, and emit a blood-curdling scream unlike no other. Are you quick enough to catch me?

spirit_jikininki.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_jikininki.spiritDescription: I will smile when I am fat with the flesh and blood of all the dead.

spirit_jurupari.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_jurupari.spiritDescription: I am the Jurupari and you may find my words are as winding as the paths I hide beyond. You may never see my crooked smile, but you will feel it in your slumber.

spirit_kalku.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_kalku.spiritDescription: I am the dark shaman and the master of strife. If I am not enough to frighten you I can always introduce you to my servants Anchimayen and Chonchon.

spirit_kamaitachi.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_kamaitachi.spiritDescription: I am the sickle weasel. I attack in threes, so fast that death arrives before you see my spiny fur shift.

spirit_kappa.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_kappa.spiritDescription: I am the river child. I make my home in the ponds and streams, protecting the dish-like depression on my head. Let it go dry, and I will no longer serve you.

spirit_katawaguruma.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_katawaguruma.spiritDescription: I roll upon the roads of Japan on a flaming ox-cart wheel. Don't let my method of travel fool you. Get too close and I'll devour your soul.

spirit_kek.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Hunter. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Fights enemy and wild spirits it encounters. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Africa. </color>
spirit_kek.spiritDescription: I am not the frog you may be thinking of. I am the Egyptian representation of night and day. If you come here to converse about my representation in this new world, keep walking.

spirit_kesari.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> India. </color>
spirit_kesari.spiritDescription: I am a brave vanara once regarded as a chief. I am noted as the slayer of Shambasadana and will continue to challenge wicked monsters alike.

spirit_kijo.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Forbidden. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Dangerous to all. Summoning is forbidden by order of the Grey Hand Coven. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_kijo.spiritDescription: Don't wonder into my mountains and caves. I will devour anything and anyone who sets foot in my territory.

spirit_kirin.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Assassin. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Attacks enemy witches with low energy. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_kirin.spiritDescription: You may only ever see me with the purest of heart. I will never appear to the wicked as I value life and purity above all else. If you find yourself consumed by my holy fire, yours is a truly dark heart.

spirit_kitsune.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Trickster. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Unpredictably casts a random spell on any witch. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Japan. </color>
spirit_kitsune.spiritDescription: I am the fox that punishes wicked holy men, the dishonest, and arrogance. Though, I may enjoy a friendly prank now and then.

spirit_lakshmi.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> India. </color>
spirit_lakshmi.spiritDescription: I am the goddess of wealth, fortune, and prosperity. Honor me and your burdens may disappear.

spirit_lalechusa.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> South America. </color>
spirit_lalechusa.spiritDescription: Don't believe in me? Whistle three times at the bell of midnight and you may find out.

spirit_lamia.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Guardian. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Protects the location where it is summoned. </color>
Commonly found in:<color=#FFFFFF99> Europe. </color>
spirit_lamia.spiritDescription: Mothers beware, summon me and I may eat your children and steal your husbands.

spirit_lares.spriitBehavior:
Type:<color=#FFFFFF99> Healer. </color>
Behavior:<color=#FFFFFF99> Blesses its summoner and allies when their energy is low. </color>

Since my first sighting in 1966, many have theorized about my wherabouts and origins. I'm out there, I promise you, waiting and watching for the one who is strong enough to master me.

spirit_whiteLady.spriitBehavior:

Nor are others permitted to lead the sun through the night realm so that it might rise again come dawn. Might, I say.  You will only find misfortune should our paths cross.

spirit_yamanba.spriitBehavior:

spirit_zashiki.spriitBehavior:
